title: DMS values are in kmol m^-3
description: In all the datasets version prior to v20200206, DMS values are 1000 times lower. DMS is reported in kmol m^-3. This is inconsistent with the units of all other tracers, which are reported as mol m^-3. For yours analysis, it would be good to multiply it by 1000 if considering unit mol m^-3. This issue is fixed for future data version v20200218 and after.
